title: The S'morepumple
thumbnail_alt: Top of a cake covered with chocolate, mini marshmallows, and graham crackers.

media.caption: Tall cake covered with chocolate, mini marshmallows, and graham crackers.
Cross-section of cake: 3 layers of different cake flavors, each with a different flavor pie in it.

overview: A whole cherry pie baked into a white cake, topped with a whole pumpkin pie baked into a spice cake, topped with a whole apple pie baked into a yellow cake, filled and frosted with vanilla buttercream frosting, then finished with chocolate ganache, chocolate chunks, marshmallows, and graham crackers.
